xpmule: you are an idiot. Thats not more legal than this version right here. But probably comes packed with a nice trojan or some other virus.
Stop spamming your shit you turd.

Damien74: Ever heard the phrase "Better to keep ones mouth shut and be thought a fool, than to open it and remove all doubt" ?

That applies to you and your comment here.

If you had bothered to check the link he posted, you would have seen they were direct download links from the service MS Provides for exactly that purpose, directly from digital river content.

The downloads are, in fact, legal, but your use of them may not be, that is a given.

So next time, investigate before making an ass of yourself.
